metadata.title: CVE-2023-28746 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Information exposure through microarchitectural state after transientexecution from some register files for some Intel(R) Atom(R) Processors mayallow an authenticated user to potentially enable information disclosurevia local access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-28746` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

intel-microcode - 3.20240312.1build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: intel-microcode package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.20240312.1build1').
